task.subject: Redesign Characteristic Configuration Page UI
task.description: The characteristic configuration page has grown long and messy. It needs reorganization and improved styling to be more user-friendly and maintainable. The UI Designer should analyze the current CharacteristicForm.tsx and related components to propose a cleaner, more organized layout.
acceptance_criteria: Form sections are logically grouped (e.g., collapsible sections, tabs, or accordions)
Visual hierarchy clearly distinguishes primary fields from advanced options
Styling is consistent with enterprise UI design system

justification: CEO direct request - The characteristic configuration is a core workflow and needs better UX to support efficient data entry and configuration by plant engineers.
